page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Takeaway QUICKGUIDE

Click here to return to Vence Magazine Introduction Just go for it, pizza’s, burgers and local stuff... This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Takeaway QUICKGUIDE

Get a whiff of fresh wood-fire baked pizza with it own unique taste. Eat in or home delivery - here everything is possible! 44 Avenue Colonel Meyère - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 67 58 La Pizza 44 Avenue Colonel Meyere, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 10/16/13 Adresse 44 Avenue Colonel Meyere 06140 Vence, France 18h00-23h00.

11h00-14h00/18h00-23h00. Pizza Jeannot ence, France - Google Maps Adresse 30 Place Antony Mars 06140 Vence, France 9/17/13 7:10 AM 30 years experience. Discover and enjoy our various pizzas, salads, sandwiches, and salted or sweet crêpes, prepared to your liking. Free delivery only in the evenings on orders over Euro10. 7 Place Antony Mars - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 94 00

La Grignote fast food and take-away. Very good quality at low prices. Specialities: pan bagnat, grignotin, americain, kebab, large selection of club sandwiches and mixed salads. 29 Avenue Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 08 93 08h00-19h00. Saturday 08h00-16h00. Closed Sunday. La Grignote Adresse 25 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

11h00-14h00/17h00-22h00, closed lunchtime Saturday and Sunday. Pizza or N’Hot Adresse 134 Avenue Emile Hugues 06140 Vence, France Choice of 50 good quality pizzas. Eat in or home delivery. 134 Avenue Emile Hugues - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 32 85 16 E-Mail: pizzaornhot@yahoo.fr www.pizzaornhot.com

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
MAGAZINE CLICK TOWATCH de Vence GUIDE TO VENCE Contact info@worldondvd.com 17, Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France Siret No 532 475 688 00018 MAGAZINE DE VENCE SPRING 2013
